verses.verse: וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh, now these הַבָּאִ֤ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im Now these [are] they that came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid to David לְצִ֣יקְלַ֔ג <S%H6860><s%> le-Tzi-ke-Lag, to Ziklag ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od was still עָצ֔וּר <S%H6113><s%> 'a-Tzur, while he yet kept himself close מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei because שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul of Saul בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son קִ֑ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> Kish; of Kish וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah were among בַּגִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <S%H1368><s%> bag-gib-bo-Rim, and they [were] among the mighty men עֹזְרֵ֖י <S%H5826><s%> 'o-ze-Rei helpers הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah. of the war

נֹ֣שְׁקֵי <S%H5401><s%> No-she-kei [They were] armed קֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> Ke-shet, with bows מַיְמִינִ֤ים <S%H3231><s%> may-mi-Nim and could use both the right hand וּמַשְׂמִאלִים֙ <S%H8041><s%> u-mas-mi-Lim and the left בָּֽאֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> ba-'a-va-Nim, in [hurling] stones וּבַחִצִּ֖ים <S%H2671><s%> u-va-chitz-Tzim and [shooting] arrows בַּקָּ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bak-Ka-shet; out of a bow מֵאֲחֵ֥י <S%H251><s%> me-'a-Chei brethren שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul [even] of Saul's מִבִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> mib-bin-ya-Min. of Benjamin

הָרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh The chief אֲחִיעֶ֜זֶר <S%H295><s%> 'a-chi-'E-zer [was] Ahiezer וְיוֹאָ֗שׁ <S%H3101><s%> ve-yo-'Ash, then Joash בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons הַשְּׁמָעָ֣ה <S%H8094><s%> hash-she-ma-'Ah of Shemaah הַגִּבְעָתִ֔י <S%H1395><s%> hag-giv-'a-Ti, the Gibeathite; וִיזוּאֵל vi-zu-'el כוִיזִיאֵ֥ל <S%H3149><s%> vi-zi-'El Jeziel קוָפֶ֖לֶט <S%H6404><s%> va-Fe-let and Pelet בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons עַזְמָ֑וֶת <S%H5820><s%> 'az-Ma-vet; of Azmaveth וּבְרָכָ֕ה <S%H1294><s%> u-ve-ra-Chah and Berachah וְיֵה֖וּא <S%H3058><s%> ve-ye-Hu and Jehu הָעֲנְּתֹתִֽי׃ <S%H6069><s%> ha-'an-ne-to-Ti. the Antothite

וְיִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <S%H3460><s%> ve-yish-ma'-Yah And Ismaiah הַגִּבְעוֹנִ֛י <S%H1393><s%> hag-giv-'o-Ni the Gibeonite גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor a mighty man בַּשְּׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> bash-she-lo-Shim among the thirty וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and over הַשְּׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7970><s%> hash-she-lo-Shim. and over the thirty

וְיִרְמְיָ֤ה <S%H3414><s%> ve-yir-me-Yah Jeremiah וְיַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <S%H3166><s%> ve-ya-cha-zi-'El Jahaziel וְי֣וֹחָנָ֔ן <S%H3076><s%> ve-Yo-cha-Nan, Jehohanan וְיוֹזָבָ֖ד <S%H3107><s%> ve-yo-za-Vad Josabad הַגְּדֵרָתִֽי׃ <S%H1452><s%> hag-ge-de-ra-Ti. Gederathite

אֶלְעוּזַ֤י <S%H498><s%> 'el-'u-Zai Eluzai וִירִימוֹת֙ <S%H3406><s%> vi-ri-mOt Jermoth וּבְעַלְיָ֣ה <S%H1183><s%> u-ve-'al-Yah Bealiah וּשְׁמַרְיָ֔הוּ <S%H8114><s%> u-she-mar-Ya-hu, Shamariah וּשְׁפַטְיָ֖הוּ <S%H8203><s%> u-she-fat-Ya-hu Shephatiah; הַחֲרִיפִי ha-cha-ri-fi כהַחֲרוּפִֽי׃ <S%H2741><s%> ha-cha-ru-Fi. Haruphite ק

אֶלְקָנָ֡ה <S%H511><s%> 'el-ka-Nah Elkanah וְ֠יִשִּׁיָּהוּ <S%H3449><s%> Ve-yish-shi-ya-hu Ishiah וַעֲזַרְאֵ֧ל <S%H5832><s%> va-'a-zar-'El Azarael וְיוֹעֶ֛זֶר <S%H3134><s%> ve-yo-'E-zer Joezer וְיָשָׁבְעָ֖ם <S%H3434><s%> ve-ya-sha-ve-'Am Jashobeam הַקָּרְחִֽים׃ <S%H7145><s%> hak-ka-re-Chim. Korahite

וְיוֹעֵאלָ֧ה <S%H3132><s%> ve-yo-'e-Lah Joelah וּזְבַדְיָ֛ה <S%H2069><s%> u-ze-vad-Yah Zebadiah בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei afflicted יְרֹחָ֖ם <S%H3395><s%> ye-ro-Cham Jeroham מִן־ min- הַגְּדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1446><s%> hag-ge-Dor. Gedor

וּמִן־ u-min- הַגָּדִ֡י <S%H1425><s%> hag-ga-Di Gadites נִבְדְּל֣וּ <S%H914><s%> niv-de-Lu make אֶל־ 'el- דָּוִיד֩ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David לַמְצַ֨ד <S%H4679><s%> lam-Tzad castle מִדְבָּ֜רָה <S%H4057><s%> mid-Ba-rah desert גִּבֹּרֵ֣י <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rei champion הַחַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> ha-Cha-yil, able אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei he צָבָא֙ <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va appointed time לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah, battle עֹרְכֵ֥י <S%H6186><s%> 'o-re-Chei array צִנָּ֖ה <S%H6793><s%> tzin-Nah buckler וָרֹ֑מַח <S%H7420><s%> va-Ro-mach; buckler וּפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-Nei accept אַרְיֵה֙ <S%H743><s%> 'ar-Yeh Aridatha פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Hem, accept וְכִצְבָאיִ֥ם <S%H6643><s%> ve-chitz-va-Yim beautiful עַל־ 'al- הֶהָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim hill לְמַהֵֽר׃ <S%H4116><s%> le-ma-Her. be carried headlong ס sa-Mek

עֵ֖זֶר <S%H5829><s%> 'E-zer Ezer הָרֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh; band עֹבַדְיָה֙ <S%H5662><s%> 'oad-Yah Obadiah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, again אֱלִיאָ֖ב <S%H446><s%> 'e-li-'Av Eliab הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi. third part
מִשְׁמַנָּה֙ <S%H4925><s%> mish-man-Nah Mishmannah הָרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I, foursquare יִרְמְיָ֖ה <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Yah Jeremiah הַחֲמִשִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi. fifth part
עַתַּי֙ <S%H6262><s%> 'at-Tai Attai הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi, sixth אֱלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H447><s%> 'e-li-'El Eliel הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I. seventh
יֽוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3076><s%> yo-cha-Nan Jehohanan הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <S%H8066><s%> hash-she-mi-Ni, eight אֶלְזָבָ֖ד <S%H443><s%> 'el-za-Vad Elzabad הַתְּשִׁיעִֽי׃ <S%H8671><s%> hat-te-shi-'I. ninth

יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu Jeremiah הָעֲשִׂירִ֔י <S%H6224><s%> ha-'a-si-Ri, tenth ס sa-Mek מַכְבַּנַּ֖י <S%H4344><s%> mach-ban-Nai Machbanai עַשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H6249><s%> 'ash-Tei eleven עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These מִבְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-nei- afflicted גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> gad Gad רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei band הַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> hatz-tza-Va; appointed time אֶחָ֤ד 'e-Chad לְמֵאָה֙ <S%H3967><s%> le-me-'Ah hundred הַקָּטָ֔ן <S%H6996><s%> hak-ka-Tan, least וְהַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ve-hag-ga-Dol aloud לְאָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> le-'A-lef. thousand

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh another הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem, like אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after עָבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-Ru alienate אֶת־ 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, ancestor וְה֥וּא ve-Hu מְמַלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> me-mal-Le accomplish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner; גִּדיֹתָיו gi-d-yo-tav כגְּדֹותָ֑יו <S%H1415><s%> ge-do-Tav; bank קוַיַּבְרִ֙יחוּ֙ <S%H1272><s%> vai-yav-Ri-chu drive away אֶת־ 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner הָ֣עֲמָקִ֔ים <S%H6010><s%> ha-'a-ma-Kim, dale לַמִּזְרָ֖ח <S%H4217><s%> lam-miz-Rach east side וְלַֽמַּעֲרָֽב׃ <S%H4628><s%> ve-Lam-ma-'a-Rav. west ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u, unto them If ye be come מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei afflicted בִנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min Benjamin וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah, Judah עַד־ 'ad- לַמְצָ֖ד <S%H4679><s%> lam-Tzad castle לְדָוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. And David

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H1732><s%> vai-ye-Tze [and he said] Thine [are we] David דָוִיד֮ <S%H3318><s%> da-Vid after לִפְנֵיהֶם֒ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem accept וַיַּ֙עַן֙ <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an testify וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer answer לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לְשָׁל֞וֹם <S%H7965><s%> le-sha-Lom peace בָּאתֶ֤ם <S%H935><s%> ba-Tem abide אֵלַי֙ 'e-Lai לְעָזְרֵ֔נִי <S%H5826><s%> le-'a-ze-Re-ni, [be] to thine helpers יִֽהְיֶה־ yih-yeh- לִּ֧י li עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם 'a-lei-Chem לֵבָ֖ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav heart לְיָ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> le-Ya-chad; alike וְאִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- lo לְרַמּוֹתַ֣נִי <S%H7411><s%> le-ram-mo-Ta-ni beguile לְצָרַ֗י <S%H6862><s%> le-tza-Rai, adversary בְּלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> be-Lo not חָמָס֙ <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas cruel בְּכַפַּ֔י <S%H3709><s%> be-chap-Pai, branch יֵ֛רֶא <S%H7200><s%> Ye-re advise self אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei for thy God אֲבוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tei-nu fathers וְיוֹכַֽח׃ <S%H3198><s%> ve-yo-Chach. appoint ס sa-Mek

וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach air לָבְשָׁ֗ה <S%H3847><s%> la-ve-Shah, apparel אֶת־ 'et- עֲמָשַׂי֮ <S%H6022><s%> 'a-ma-Sai Amasai רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh to [the jeopardy of] our heads; הַשְּׁלֹושִׁים hash-she-lo-shim כהַשָּׁלִישִׁים֒ <S%H7970><s%> hash-sha-li-Shim thirty קלְךָ֤ le-Cha דָוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid to David וְעִמְּךָ֣ ve-'im-me-Cha בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- afflicted יִשַׁ֔י <S%H3448><s%> yi-Shai, Jesse שָׁל֨וֹם׀ <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom favor שָׁל֜וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom favor לְךָ֗ le-Cha, וְשָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> ve-sha-lOm favor לְעֹ֣זְרֶ֔ךָ <S%H5826><s%> le-'O-ze-Re-cha, but they helped כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki did not עֲזָרְךָ֖ <S%H5826><s%> 'a-za-re-Cha help אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; angels וַיְקַבְּלֵ֣ם <S%H6901><s%> vay-kab-be-Lem choose דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, to David וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nem cost בְּרָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> be-ra-Shei our heads הַגְּדֽוּד׃ <S%H1416><s%> hag-ge-Dud. army פ Peh

וּמִֽמְּנַשֶּׁ֞ה <S%H4519><s%> u-mi-me-nash-Sheh to him of Manasseh נָפְל֣וּ <S%H4480><s%> na-fe-Lu there עַל־ <S%H5307><s%> 'al- there fell דָּוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, David בְּבֹא֨וֹ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'O abide עִם־ 'im- פְּלִשְׁתִּ֧ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim Philistine עַל־ <S%H4421><s%> 'al- battle שָׁא֛וּל <S%H5921><s%> sha-'Ul and לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H7586><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah Saul וְלֹ֣א <S%H5826><s%> ve-Lo help עֲזָרֻ֑ם 'a-za-Rum; כִּ֣י ki בְעֵצָ֗ה <S%H6098><s%> ve-'e-Tzah, advice שִׁלְּחֻ֜הוּ <S%H7971><s%> shil-le-Chu-hu forsake סַרְנֵ֤י <S%H5633><s%> sar-Nei lord פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim Philistine לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, answer בְּרָאשֵׁ֕ינוּ <S%H7218><s%> be-ra-Shei-nu captains יִפּ֖וֹל <S%H5307><s%> yip-Pol defected אֶל־ 'el- אֲדֹנָ֥יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav master שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul. Saul

בְּלֶכְתּ֣וֹ <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-To along אֶל־ 'el- צִֽיקְלַ֗ג <S%H6860><s%> tzik-Lag, Ziklag נָפְל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lu cast down עָלָ֣יו׀ 'a-Lav מִֽמְּנַשֶּׁ֡ה <S%H4519><s%> mi-me-nash-Sheh Manasseh עַ֠דְנַח <S%H5734><s%> 'Ad-nach Adnah וְיוֹזָבָ֤ד <S%H3107><s%> ve-yo-za-Vad Josabad וִידִֽיעֲאֵל֙ <S%H3043><s%> vi-di-'a-'El Jediael וּמִיכָאֵ֣ל <S%H4317><s%> u-mi-cha-'El Michael וְיוֹזָבָ֔ד <S%H3107><s%> ve-yo-za-Vad, Josabad וֶאֱלִיה֖וּא <S%H453><s%> ve-'e-li-Hu Elihu וְצִלְּתָ֑י <S%H6769><s%> ve-tzil-le-Tai; Zilthai רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei band הָאֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> ha-'a-la-Fim thousand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לִמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> lim-nash-Sheh.
